SQL_STMT_U.val: select D.DOCCUR, S.DESCRIPTION, D.DocDate, case when D.NumAtCard is null or trim(D.NumAtCard) = '' then D.Comments else D.NumAtCard end as 'NumAtCard', D.CardName, C.Dscription, IIF(C.BaseRef is null or C.BaseRef='','', CONCAT( 'GR-', D.U_IDU_Kode_PT, '-', CAST( C.BaseRef as varchar(15) ) ) ) AS GrNumber, CASE WHEN D.DocNum IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT( 'FP-', D.U_IDU_Kode_PT, '-', CAST( D.DocNum as varchar(15) ) ) ELSE '' END AS InvNumber, C.U_IDU_QtyPack, C.Quantity, C.PriceBefDi AS Price, ( (C.Quantity * C.PriceBefDi) * (C.DiscPrcnt / 100) ) AS Discon, C.VatSum, C.LineTotal + C.VatSum 'LineTotal', D.DocRate, IIF(RANK() over (partition by D.DocEntry order by D.Docentry, C.LineNum)=1, D.RoundDif, NULL) as [RoundDif], IIF(RANK() over (partition by D.DocEntry order by D.Docentry, C.LineNum)=1, D.DiscSum, NULL) as [DiscSum], IIF(RANK() over (partition by D.DocEntry order by D.Docentry, C.LineNum)=1, D.DpmAmnt, NULL) as [DpmAmnt], IIF(RANK() over (partition by D.DocEntry order by D.Docentry, C.LineNum)=1, D.DpmVat, NULL) as [DpmVat], IIF(RANK() over (partition by D.DocEntry order by D.Docentry, C.LineNum)=1, D.VatSum, NULL) as [VatSum], IIF(RANK() over (partition by D.DocEntry order by D.Docentry, C.LineNum)=1, D.WTSum, NULL) as [WTSum], IIF(RANK() over (partition by D.DocEntry order by D.Docentry, C.LineNum)=1, D.DocTotal, NULL) as [DocTotal], C.DocEntry from PCH1 C JOIN OPCH D ON D.DocEntry = C.DocEntry AND D.CANCELED = 'N' LEFT JOIN SYS_GCM S ON S.CONDITION='DOCTYPE' AND S.GCM_ID=D.DOCTYPE WHERE D.DataSource = 'S' AND D.CANCELED = 'N' AND D.DOCNUM IS NOT NULL AND D.DOCDATE BETWEEN ':1' AND ':2' AND (C.Dscription like'%'+ISNULL(':3','')+'%') AND (D.CARDCODE = ':4' or ':4' is null or ':4' = '') AND (D.U_IDU_Kode_PT = ':5' or ':5' is null or ':5' = '') ORDER BY D.DocDate ASC

select Count(C.DocEntry) as RowSpan from PCH1 C JOIN OPCH D ON D.DocEntry = C.DocEntry AND D.CANCELED = 'N' WHERE D.DataSource = 'S' AND D.CANCELED = 'N' AND D.DOCNUM IS NOT NULL AND D.DOCDATE BETWEEN ':1' AND ':2' AND (C.Dscription like'%'+ISNULL(':3','')+'%') AND (D.CARDCODE = ':4' or ':4' is null or ':4' = '') AND (D.U_IDU_Kode_PT = ':5' or ':5' is null or ':5' = '') AND (C.DocEntry = :6) group by C.DocEntry

select D.DOCCUR, B.DocDate, case when B.NumAtCard is null or trim(b.NumAtCard) = '' then b.Comments else b.NumAtCard end as 'NumAtCard', B.CardName, A.Dscription, CONCAT( 'GR-', B.U_IDU_Kode_PT, '-', CAST( B.DocNum as varchar(10) ) ) AS GrNumber, CASE WHEN D.DocNum IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT( 'FP-', D.U_IDU_Kode_PT, '-', CAST( D.DocNum as varchar(10) ) ) ELSE '' END AS InvNumber, A.U_IDU_QtyPack, A.Quantity, CASE when d.DocNum is null then A.PriceBefDi else C.PriceBefDi END AS Price, ( (C.Quantity * C.PriceBefDi) * (C.DiscPrcnt / 100) ) AS Discon, C.VatSum, CASE WHEN d.DocNum is null THEN A.LineTotal ELSE C.LineTotal + C.VatSum END as 'LineTotal' from (PDN1 A join OPDN B on A.DocEntry = b.DocEntry ) LEFT JOIN (PCH1 C JOIN OPCH D ON D.DocEntry = C.DocEntry AND D.CANCELED = 'N') ON C.BaseEntry = A.DocEntry AND C.BaseLine = A.LineNum WHERE B.DataSource = 'S' AND B.CANCELED = 'N' AND D.DOCNUM IS NOT NULL AND B.DOCDATE BETWEEN ':1' AND ':2' AND (A.ITEMCODE = ':3' or ':3' is null or ':3' = '') AND (B.CARDCODE = ':4' or ':4' is null or ':4' = '') AND (B.U_IDU_Kode_PT = ':5' or ':5' is null or ':5' = '') ORDER BY B.DocDate ASC

select D.DocDate, s.description, case when D.NumAtCard is null or trim(D.NumAtCard) = '' then D.Comments else D.NumAtCard end as 'NumAtCard', D.CardName, C.Dscription, IIF(C.BaseRef is null or C.BaseRef='','', CONCAT( 'GR-', D.U_IDU_Kode_PT, '-', CAST( C.BaseRef as varchar(15) ) ) ) AS GrNumber, CASE WHEN D.DocNum IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT( 'FP-', D.U_IDU_Kode_PT, '-', CAST( D.DocNum as varchar(15) ) ) ELSE '' END AS InvNumber, C.U_IDU_QtyPack, C.Quantity, C.PriceBefDi AS Price, ( (C.Quantity * C.PriceBefDi) * (C.DiscPrcnt / 100) ) AS Discount, C.VatSum, C.LineTotal + C.VatSum as 'LineTotal', D.DocStatus, D.DocCur, D.DocRate, IIF(RANK() over (partition by D.DocEntry order by D.Docentry, C.LineNum)=1, D.RoundDif, NULL) as [RoundDif], IIF(RANK() over (partition by D.DocEntry order by D.Docentry, C.LineNum)=1, D.DiscSum, NULL) as [DiscSum], IIF(RANK() over (partition by D.DocEntry order by D.Docentry, C.LineNum)=1, D.DpmAmnt, NULL) as [DpmAmnt], IIF(RANK() over (partition by D.DocEntry order by D.Docentry, C.LineNum)=1, D.DpmVat, NULL) as [DpmVat], IIF(RANK() over (partition by D.DocEntry order by D.Docentry, C.LineNum)=1, D.VatSum, NULL) as [VatSum], IIF(RANK() over (partition by D.DocEntry order by D.Docentry, C.LineNum)=1, D.WTSum, NULL) as [WTSum], IIF(RANK() over (partition by D.DocEntry order by D.Docentry, C.LineNum)=1, D.DocTotal, NULL) as [DocTotal] from PCH1 C JOIN OPCH D ON D.DocEntry = C.DocEntry LEFT JOIN SYS_GCM S ON S.CONDITION='DOCTYPE' AND S.GCM_ID=D.DOCTYPE WHERE D.DataSource = 'S' AND D.CANCELED = 'N' AND D.DOCNUM IS NOT NULL AND D.DOCDATE BETWEEN ':1' AND ':2' AND (C.Dscription like'%'+ISNULL(':3','')+'%') AND (D.CARDCODE = ':4' or ':4' is null or ':4' = '') AND (D.U_IDU_Kode_PT = ':5' or ':5' is null or ':5' = '') AND D.DOCNUM IS NOT NULL and d.doctype=:6 ORDER BY D.DocDate ASC

select B.DocDate, case when B.NumAtCard is null or trim(b.NumAtCard) = '' then b.Comments else b.NumAtCard end as 'NumAtCard', B.CardName, A.Dscription, CONCAT( 'GR-', B.U_IDU_Kode_PT, '-', CAST( B.DocNum as varchar(10) ) ) AS GrNumber, CASE WHEN D.DocNum IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT( 'FP-', D.U_IDU_Kode_PT, '-', CAST( D.DocNum as varchar(10) ) ) ELSE '' END AS InvNumber, C.U_IDU_QtyPack, C.Quantity, CASE when d.DocNum is null then A.PriceBefDi else C.PriceBefDi END AS Price, ( (C.Quantity * C.PriceBefDi) * (C.DiscPrcnt / 100) ) AS Discon, C.VatSum, CASE WHEN d.DocNum is null THEN A.LineTotal ELSE C.LineTotal + C.VatSum END as 'LineTotal' from (PDN1 A join OPDN B on A.DocEntry = b.DocEntry ) LEFT JOIN (PCH1 C JOIN OPCH D ON D.DocEntry = C.DocEntry AND D.CANCELED = 'N') ON C.BaseEntry = A.DocEntry AND C.BaseLine = A.LineNum WHERE B.DataSource = 'S' AND B.CANCELED = 'N' AND D.DOCNUM IS NOT NULL AND B.DOCDATE BETWEEN ':1' AND ':2' AND (A.ITEMCODE = ':3' or ':3' is null or ':3' = '') AND (B.CARDCODE = ':4' or ':4' is null or ':4' = '') AND (B.U_IDU_Kode_PT = ':5' or ':5' is null or ':5' = '') ORDER BY B.DocDate ASC

select B.DocCur,B.DocDate,B.U_IDU_Driver,B.CardName,A.Dscription,CONCAT('DO-',A.OcrCode,'-',CAST(B.DocNum as varchar(10))) AS DoNumber,CASE WHEN D.DocNum IS NOT NULL THEN CONCAT('FP-',C.OcrCode,'-',CAST(D.DocNum as varchar(10))) ELSE '' END AS InvNumber,C.U_IDU_QtyPack,C.Quantity,C.PriceBefDi,((C.Quantity * C.PriceBefDi) * (C.DiscPrcnt/100)) AS Discon,C.LineTotal from DLN1 A join ODLN B on A.DocEntry=b.DocEntry LEFT JOIN INV1 C ON C.BaseEntry=A.DocEntry AND C.BaseLine = A.LineNum LEFT JOIN OINV D ON D.DocEntry = C.DocEntry AND D.CANCELED = 'N' WHERE B.DataSource = 'S' AND B.CANCELED = 'N' AND B.DOCDATE BETWEEN ':1' AND ':2' AND (A.ITEMCODE = ':3' or ':3' is null or ':3' = '') AND (B.CARDCODE = ':4' or ':4' is null or ':4' = '') AND (B.U_IDU_Kode_PT = ':5' or ':5' is null or ':5' = '') AND D.DOCNUM IS NOT NULL ORDER BY A.Dscription ASC
